name: rslookup
description: Simplify your college experience by effortlessly accessing professor info, lab locations, campus amenities, and much more!

shortcuts.name: Professors
shortcuts.description: Locate your professors on campus hassle-free. Say goodbye to wandering through hallways or frantically searching for room numbers.

shortcuts.name: Labs
shortcuts.description: Finding your designated lab spaces with ease. No more wandering around campus, feeling lost and bewildered.

shortcuts.name: Student Council
shortcuts.description: Meet the Faces Behind Your Voice: Get to Know the Members of the Student Council!

shortcuts.name: Academic Helpdesk
shortcuts.description: Find all the Academic POCs in one place. Get your academic queries resolved in no time.

shortcuts.name: Documents
shortcuts.description: Essential Resources at Your Fingertips: Access Crucial Documents

shortcuts.name: Amenities
shortcuts.description: Find every amenity on campus, from Academic Blocks to Cafeterias, all in one place.

shortcuts.name: Events
shortcuts.description: Stay Updated with the Latest Campus Events: Never Miss Out on the Fun!

shortcuts.name: Cultural Clubs
shortcuts.description: Discover the Heartbeat of Campus Life: Explore All University Clubs and Their Core Members at a Glance!

shortcuts.name: Technical Clubs
shortcuts.description: Discover the Heartbeat of Campus Life: Explore All University Clubs and Their Core Members at a Glance!
